questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. How is the ARP request from VM1 forwarded when VM2 is not learned in the Cisco ACI fabric?

choices.C: Leaf 101 encapsulates the ARP request into a multicast packet that is destined to 225.0.37.192.
choices.D: Leaf 101 switch consumes the ARP reply of VM2 to update the local endpoint table.
choices.A: Leaf 101 forwards the ARP request to one of the proxy VTEP spines.
choices.B: POD1 spine responds to the ARP request after the POD1 COOP is updated with the VM2 location.

discussion.content: Questions are not completely Valid.. 30% are new
Question are not valid anymore. 80 % new

Selected Answer: A
Reference the verbiage below Figure 35. 
Use of ARP Glean Messages across Pods

1. EP1 generates an ARP request to determine EP2’s MAC address.

2. The local leaf does not have EP2’s information but since ARP flooding is disabled it encapsulates the ARP request toward one of the Proxy Anycast VTEP addresses available on the local spine nodes (no flooding along the local multi-destination tree is allowed).

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/solutions/collateral/data-center-virtualization/application-centric-infrastructure/white-paper-c11-737855.html

questions.question_text: An engineer deployed a Cisco ACI fabric and noticed that the fabric learns endpoints from subnets that are not configured on a bridge domain. To meet strict security requirements, the engineer must prevent this behavior. Which action must be taken to prevent this behavior?

choices.A: Activate Enable Data Plane Endpoint Learning

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. The requirement is to prefer the local PBR node and redirect the traffic to the remote pod PBR node in the case of catastrophic node failure. Which configuration meets these requirements?

choices.D:
location-based PBR
host route advertisement
node tracking
choices.C:
symmetric PBR
unidirectional PBR
resilient hashing
choices.A:
location-based PBR
host route advertisement
resilient hashing
choices.B:
symmetric PBR
location-based PBR
resilient hashing

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D. location-based PBR
host route advertisement
node tracking

Selected Answer: B
B. MP-BGP EVPN

questions.question_text: Which protocol is used to exchange the MAC/IP address information for endpoints between spine switches in different pods in a Cisco Multi-Pod solution?
Which mechanism is used by ACI spine switches to maintain a consistent copy of the endpoint address and location information?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. COOP

COOP db, information in table format
